name: flare-setup-bot
description: Discord setup bot that bootstraps and maintains the Flare HQ server

scripts.stop: orb run -m openclaw-vm bash -c 'cd /home/filipefernandes/openclaw && set -a && source .env && set +a && docker compose stop sentinel'
scripts.restart: orb run -m openclaw-vm bash -c 'cd /home/filipefernandes/openclaw && set -a && source .env && set +a && docker compose restart sentinel'
scripts.logs: orb run -m openclaw-vm bash -c 'cd /home/filipefernandes/openclaw && set -a && source .env && set +a && docker compose logs --tail 50 -f sentinel'

author: Filipe Fernandes
